title: hobo licensing
content:
I am looking to use hobo in a phone application but I can't see any information regarding licensing, I know it installed free on millions of computers but where can I find out if I can use this font in my app?

I have tried googling but I can't seem to find the answer. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
author: philstar

comments.content:
It would cost you ten times a desktop license:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/hobo/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415032503/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/hobo/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/hobo/")
Friends don't let friends use Hobo in their apps.
